title: Colorpal
description: A SPA/REST based web application which allows users to extract color palettes from images that they upload. It utilizes OpenCV & K-Means to extract the color palettes of uploaded images, and Flask, React and Redux for the core web application.

title: Photowall
description: A public image board that allows users to upload an image, stores the images in AWS S3 and displays them on one public board everone can contribute to. I created this project as preparation for a new job in order t learn how to use Ruby on Rails alongside Vue.

title: OpenCV Motion Detector
description: A Python and OpenCV program that utilizes background subtraction to work as a home-made motion detector. Can work with live-streamed video or pre-recorded video files.

title: Portfolio
description: The webiste you're on right now! I built this website to showcase my current and upcoming projects. I used Gatsby JS to turn React into Static HTML/CSS/JS for increased load times, GraphQL to query and auto generate components from markdown, and Netlify serverless lambda functions to serve emails from my contact form.
